WorkItem.Description:
Hi everbody 

I´m not a big PC and english crack but hope you can help me........
I´ve recovered my layptop back to beginning and installed vr player fresh and the k lite mega code pack
but now vr player crashes after watching a video some seconds..... before the recovery everthing works fine -.- so anybody know what to do??? tried diffrent player versions but nothing helps

best regards Disaster
WorkItem.Summary: crash after a few seconds while watching
